mapper.select: select c.course_id as courseId, c.course_name as courseName, c.course_address, c.audit_status, c.course_type, c.teach_type, t1.teacher_name as checkUser, t2.teacher_name as creator from course left join teacher t1 on t1.teacher_id = c.check_user left join teacher t2 on t2.teacher_id = c.creator where course_id = #{courseId}
